BusinessName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: HOUSING OPPORTUNITIES PROJECT FOR EXCELLENCE INC

IRS990.ActivityOrMissionDesc: HOPE, INC'S MISSION IS TO FIGHT HOUSING DISCRIMINATION IN MIAMI-DADE, AND BROWARD COUNTIES, AND TO PROMOTE EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITIES THROUGHOUT THE STATE OF FLORIDA.
IRS990.MissionDesc: HOPE INC'S MISSION IS TO FIGHT HOUSING DISCRIMINATION IN MIAMI-DADE, AND BROWARD COUNTIES, AND TO PROMOTE EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITIES THROUGHOUT THE STATE OF FLORIDA.
IRS990.Desc: EDUCATION AND OUTREACH INITIATIVE PROGRAM IS DESIGNED TO ENSURE THAT THE GENERAL PUBLIC AND PROTECTED CLASSES UNDER FEDERAL, STATE AND LOCAL FAIR HOUSING LAWS BECOME KNOWLEDGEABLE CONCERNING THEIR RIGHTS AND THE MEANS AVAILABLE TO SEEK REDRESS FOR FAIR HOUSING VIOLATIONS. THE INITIATIVE ALSO INCLUDES PRIVATE HOUSING INDUSTRY PROVIDER EDUCATION PROGRAMS STRUCTURED TO FURNISH DEVELOPERS, REAL ESTATE BROKERS, PROPERTY MANAGERS, FINANCIAL INSTITUTIONS, AND THE MEDIA/ ADVERTISING INDUSTRY WITH THE MOST CURRENT INFORMATION NECESSARY TO FULLY COMPLY WITH FAIR HOUSING LAWS. ASSISTANCE IS PROVIDED TO LOCAL JURISDICTIONS IN MEETING THEIR MANDATED RESPONSIBILITY TO AFFIRMATIVELY FURTHER FAIR HOUSING. FAIR HOUSING COUNSELING, AS WELL AS INFORMATION AND REFERRAL SERVICES, ARE PROVIDED TO SOUTH FLORIDA RESIDENTS SEEKING HOUSING OPPORTUNITIES IN THE PRIVATE HOUSING MARKET.

ProgSrvcAccomActy2Grp.Desc: THE PRIVATE ENFORCEMENT INITIATIVE PROGRAM INCLUDES INTAKE OF COMPLAINTS OF HOUSING DISCRIMINATION, INVESTIGATION OF ALLEGED FAIR HOUSING VIOLATIONS, FAIR HOUSING TESTING, AND PURSUING THE ENFORCEMENT OF MERITORIOUS CLAIMS.

ProgSrvcAccomActy3Grp.Desc: COMMUNITY HOUSING ASSESSABILITY PROGRAM - THIS PROGRAM PROMOTES THE INVESTMENT INTO NEIGHBORHOODS THAT HAVE BEEN HARD HIT BY THE FORECLOSURE CRISIS AND SUPPORT HOMEOWNERSHIP, NEIGHBORHOOD STABILIZATION, PROPERTY REHABILITATION AND HOUSING DEVELOPMENT.

Form990ScheduleAPartVIGrp.ExplanationTxt: OTHER INCOME CONSISTS OF IS LITIGATION SETTLEMENTS AND TRAINING REVENUE.

SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: IF IT IS MORE THAN LIKELY THAN NOT THAT THE TAX POSITION WILL BE SUSTAINED ON EXAMINATION BY TAXING AUTHORITIES, BASED ON THE TECHNICAL MERITS OF THE POSITION. THE TAX BENEFITS RECOGNIZED IN THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS FROM SUCH POSITION ARE MEASURED BASED ON THE LARGEST BENEFIT THAT HAS A GREATER THAN 50 PERCENT LIKELIHOOD OF BEING REALIZED UPON ULTIMATE SETTLEMENT. MANAGEMENT EVALUATED THE CORPORATION'S TAX POSITIONS AND CONCLUDED THAT THE CORPORATION HAD TAKEN NO UNCERTAIN TAX POSITIONS THAT REQUIRE ADJUSTMENT TO THE FINANCIAL STATEMENTS TO COMPLY WITH THE PROVISIONS OF THIS GUIDANCE. GENERALLY, THE CORPORATION IS NO LONGER SUBJECT TO INCOME TAX EXAMINATIONS BY U.S. FEDERAL STATE OR LOCAL TAX AUTHORITIES FOR THE YEARS BEFORE 2020 WHICH IS THE STANDARD STATUTE OF LIMITATIONS PERIOD.

THE AGENCY HAS THE NECESSARY PROCESS IN PLACE THAT ENSURE THE GRANT REQUIREMENTS ARE BEING MET. THIS INCLUDES MEETINGS HELD TO DISCUSS PROGRESS OF PROJECTS AS WELL AS ADDITIONAL MONITORING OF ACCOMPLISHMENTS ATTAINED.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 6
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HOPE INC'S GOVERNING BODY CONSISTS OF FOURTEEN (14) DIRECTORS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section A, Line 7a
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HOPE INC'S GOVERNING BODY INCLUDES FOUR (4) EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE MEMBERS WHO ARE RESPONSIBLE FOR ELECTING ONE OR MORE MEMBERS OF THE GOVERNING BODY.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 11b
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: REVIEW OF THE 990 TAX RETURN - STARTS WITH PREPARATION BY OUR INDEPENDENT ACCOUNTANT WHO SUBMITS A DRAFT TO THE PRESIDENT / CEO FOR REVIEW. THE PRESIDENT / CEO SUBMITS THE RETURN TO THE MEMBERS OF THE AUDIT & FINANCE COMMITTEE FOR SECONDARY REVIEW. ONCE APPROVED BY AUDIT & FINANCE COMMITTEE, THE RETURN IS THEN SUBMITTED TO THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS FOR FINAL APPROVAL, AND DOCUMENTATION, BEFORE IT IS FILED WITH THE IRS.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 12c
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HOPE'S CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY IS MONITORED AND ENFORCED BY HAVING OFFICERS, DIRECTORS, AND ALL EMPLOYEES SIGN AN ANNUAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST DISCLOSURE FORM. FAILURE TO DISCLOSE ANY ACTUAL OR POTENTIAL CONFLICT OF INTEREST WOULD RESULT IN DISCIPLINARY ACTION. INCLUDING DISMISSAL.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section B, Line 15
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HOPE INC'S COMPENSATION DETERMINATION PROCESS - FOR THE PRESIDENT / CEO IS MADE BY THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS AND IS BASED ON PERFORMANCE DOCUMENTED IN THE ANNUAL EVALUATION BY THE EXECUTIVE COMMITTEE AND RATIFIED BY THE FULL BOARD OF DIRECTORS. THE BOARD OF DIRECTORS HAS AUTHORIZED THE PRESIDENT / CEO TO ESTABLISH THE SALARY OF THE VICE PRESIDENT BASED ON PERFORMANCE DOCUMENTED IN AN ANNUAL EVALUATION. THE BOARD'S APPROVAL THERETO IS MADE IN THE APPROVAL OF THE ORGANIZATIONS' ANNUAL BUDGET.

SupplementalInformationDetail.FormAndLineReferenceDesc: Form 990, Part VI, Section C, Line 19
SupplementalInformationDetail.ExplanationTxt: HOPE INC'S GOVERNING DOCUMENTS, CONFLICT OF INTEREST POLICY, AND FINANCIAL STATEMENTS ARE MADE AVAILABLE UPON REQUEST IN HARD COPY, VIA U.S. MAIL, OR IF DESIRED, BY ELECTRONIC MAIL.

DirectControllingEntityName.BusinessNameLine1Txt: HOUSING OPPORTUNITIES PROJECTS FOR EXCELLENCE INC
